name: Al Waali
description: Al Waali is one of the names of Allah in Islamic tradition, meaning 'The Sole Governor' or 'The Patron'.
summary: The name Al Waali signifies Allah's role as the ultimate authority and protector over all creation. It indicates His sovereignty and ability to manage and govern the affairs of the universe. The origin of this name can be traced to Arabic roots, where it emphasizes the loving and guiding relationship Allah has with His creation, showcasing His mercy and power.
